title: I Had a Terrible but Beautiful Dream While I Was Napping
body: There I was, all alone in a field, simply enjoying life and minding my own business. Then suddenly waifus started appearing out of nowhere. I was really happy because they all wanted to be mai waifus, but there were too many of them, and I couldn't make them all happy. However, I couldn't turn any of them away because they were too attracted to my sheer awesomeness. What should I have done?
